divs: sighting detailsthere was one ufo hovering at first then started to move up and down irractlty then back and fourth. then another appeared from undernieth of the first one. two more came to view from under the other ones and they were there for a few minutes. myself and my roommate tried to follow them in my truck then they dissaperd. my roommate has video of the same ufo on youtube from 9\22\2009. she seen them around the same time as we did tonight. her video on youtube says ufos in pontiac michigan 09\22\09. her video shows only one we seen 4 tonight. thanks.
